channel.title: Call me Sam
channel.description: Recent content on Call me Sam

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Sam. I’m a theme for Hugo. I’m an extremely customizable, content-focused theme that lets you showcase your work your way. I’m open source on GitHub. I have slick minimalist templates for list pages (such as a list of blog posts) and single pages (a page to read one blog post). You can use tags on your content, and view content by tags. I also have a simple responsive gallery feature.
